lead_paragraph: Bruce Bowen was the final player cut from the United States team that begins play in the world championship in Japan on Saturday. Bowen, who plays for San Antonio and is one of the top defensive players in the N.B.A., was seen as the type of role player the United States squad had been lacking in recent poor international showings, but was not impressive in tuneup games.
